name: Kill Gorg with Dice
description:
Can you beat Gorg in this strategic 1v1 dice battle?

You and Gorg take turns rolling dice and attacking, upgrading, or saving your points.

  • Attack: Deal your dice value as damage to Gorg
  • Upgrade: Spend your points at the upgrade store to get buffs, dice, and more
  • Save: Save your dice value as points for a later turn

Upgrading also requires dice! Roll the golden upgrade die to see which upgrades you can buy. (If you roll multiple upgrade dice, the highest die value will be used). Make sure you have enough points!

The upgrade store has a lot of useful upgrades to take down Gorg!

  • Heal Up: Regain 15 health
  • Double Damage: On your next turn deal 2x damage to Gorg
  • Super Saver: On your next turn save 3x your dice value as points
  • Shield: When Gorg attacks, cut the damage you take in half. You can only have 1 shield at a time.
  • Add an Upgrade Die: Buy another upgrade die (max 3)
  • Add a Die: Buy another die for your set! (max 5)

Get Gorg's health down to zero before he kills you!

This game was made in a weekend so there are probably bugs! When in doubt, click the buttons and hopefully you'll be ok!
